{{Stub}}

'''Jo Ann Richards''' is the wife of notated murderer and lunatic [[Mark Richards]]. She appeared on [[Project Camelot]] to promote Mark's story.

She seems like a legitimately nice lady, although she definitely profits off of Mark's lies by selling materials and doing speaking tours.
